notes.body:
Dear Shruti

Thanks for sharing the reports.  But i do not require these partial reports any longer.  It was meant for a doctor's consultation and i had to cancel my doctor's appointment and i am not available till first week of January to meet the doctor again.

It was really disappointing service from your team as I have been behind your customer service team for an update since last 3 days.  But unfortunately, in spite of my repeated efforts not updates received which forced me to cancel the doctor's appointment.

As per the telephonic talks had with your customer service, now I need a complete refund of charges I have paid as the partial reports you have shared no use for me.

Request you to arrange the refunds immediately

Regards

Vinod Poduval
91-9820563269

________________________________
notes.body_html:
Dear Shruti  

Thanks for sharing the reports.  But i do not require these partial reports any longer.  It was meant for a doctor's consultation and i had to cancel my doctor's appointment and i am not available till first week of January to meet the doctor again. 

It was really disappointing service from your team as I have been behind your customer service team for an update since last 3 days.  But unfortunately, in spite of my repeated efforts not updates received which forced me to cancel the doctor's appointment. 

As per the telephonic talks had with your customer service, now I need a complete refund of charges I have paid as the partial reports you have shared no use for me. 

Request you to arrange the refunds immediately

Regards

Vinod Poduval
91-9820563269

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Rajesh Kumawat <rajeshkumawat217184@gmail.com>
Date: Tue, Dec 9, 2025 at 8:21 PM
Subject: Re: Reminder & Escalation Request – No Response to Final Legal Notice and CEO Contact Required
To: PharmEasy <care@pharmeasy.in>, grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in>, <rahulguha@pharmeasy.in>, <siddharthshah@pharmeasy.in>, <harshshailesh@pharmeasy.in>, <parekh@pharmeasy.in>, <dharmilnirupamsheth@pharmeasy.in>


To,
The Director,
Managing Director Rahul Guha, Vice Chairman Siddharth Shah, Wholetime Directors Harsh Shailesh, Parekh and Dharmil Nirupam Sheth,
Pharm Easy
Subject: Repeated Negligence, No Written Timelines, Misleading Assurances & Financial Loss – Final Intimation Before Legal Action
Sir/Madam,
This email is to bring to your immediate attention that despite several complaints, follow-ups and even a Final Legal Notice, Pharm Easy has neither provided any written response nor taken any concrete action to resolve my matter.
Your customer care team has continuously shown negligence, miscommunication and unprofessional behaviour, which has caused me financial loss and unnecessary harassment.
Unprofessional & Harassing Behaviour by Support Team
When I asked for clear written timelines (24 hours or 48 hours), your employees refused to give anything in writing.
I spoke to:
                •             Senior Executive ID: AAR3483
                •             Junior Executive ID: AAR4013
 
Both kept repeating the same scripted line — “Sir, we cannot give written confirmation.”
This behaviour is not just negligence — it amounts to:
 
✔ Mentally detaining (mildly arresting) the customer by making him wait endlessly without clarity
✔ Forcing repeated follow-ups after already knowing the issue — which is equivalent to “Mare hove hors par chhadi Marna”, meaning causing unnecessary trouble even after the matter was already clear
This shows deliberate delay and intentional harassment.
Order Threatening & Wrong Statements
I was also told:
“He will come to place the order 4-5 times, if he doesn't get a response, it will be cancelled..”
Whereas I had already informed clearly:
✔ No order should be accepted
✔ No order should be cancelled
without my permission
till my issue is resolved.
No Response to Previous Notice
Despite sending an official Final Legal Notice earlier regarding:
                •             Delay
                •             Wrong “Incorrect Pin code” justification
                •             Misrepresentation
                •             ticket loss
                •             Travel & waiting cost loss
                •             Time loss
                •             Emotional stress
No written reply has been provided till today.
Escalation to CEO Also Blocked
When I asked for CEO Mr. Rahul Guha official email ID, your team:
                •             First said “not available”
                •             Then said “cannot provide”
Why is the escalation path being blocked for a customer whose financial losses have been caused directly by your service failure?
Financial Losses for Which Pharm Easy Is Fully Liable
Due to your team’s false assurances, negligence and mental harassment:
                •             My ticket
                •             Travel expenses lost
                •             Waiting charges added
                •             Time was wasted
                •             Additional mental stress caused
I will claim full reimbursement.
Final Notice
If this non-response continues:
Please note:
If the matter proceeds legally, CEO Mr. Rahul Guha may be required to appear personally, depending on the court’s direction.
My Final Demands
                1.            Immediate written response to my previous Legal Notice.
                2.            Clear written timeline (24 hours).
                3.            Official escalation details of senior management.
                4.            Full reimbursement of all financial losses caused by Pharm Easy.
This is my final escalation before initiating legal action.

Dear PharmEasy Support Team,

I am writing to follow up on the unresolved return request for Order ID
654541253527977984.

As previously informed, the Keraglo shampoo arrived with a loose cap,
causing leakage and spoiling the inner carton. I reported this on 7th
December 2025 with photographs and all required details. Since then, I have
repeatedly been assured that the item will be collected and the refund
processed.

However, the return pickup has failed again today. I even spoke with the
delivery person, who simply shrugged off his responsibility and stated that
he would not accept any damaged goods, despite the fact that he did not
even come to check the item.

This same situation has been ongoing since 8th December, where I keep
receiving messages that the return shipment will be picked up, yet no one
arrives.

This continued delay and lack of accountability is extremely unacceptable.

I request urgent intervention from your team to ensure that the pickup is
completed without further excuses and that the refund is processed promptly.

Kindly take immediate action and provide a resolution at the earliest.

Thank you.

Regards,
[Your Name]

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Urgent Follow-Up: Repeated Return Pickup Failures – Order ID 654541253527977984
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Support Team,

I am writing to follow up on the unresolved return request for Order ID 654541253527977984.

As previously informed, the Keraglo shampoo arrived with a loose cap, causing leakage and spoiling the inner carton. I reported this on 7th December 2025 with photographs and all required details. Since then, I have repeatedly been assured that the item will be collected and the refund processed.

However, the return pickup has failed again today. I even spoke with the delivery person, who simply shrugged off his responsibility and stated that he would not accept any damaged goods, despite the fact that he did not even come to check the item.

This same situation has been ongoing since 8th December, where I keep receiving messages that the return shipment will be picked up, yet no one arrives.

This continued delay and lack of accountability is extremely unacceptable.

I request urgent intervention from your team to ensure that the pickup is completed without further excuses and that the refund is processed promptly.

Kindly take immediate action and provide a resolution at the earliest.

Thank you.

Regards,
[Your Name]

notes.body_html:
Hello Kousik,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
​With regards to your order #658065184747945984-89933, I see your order is at the order confirmation stage. The estimated delivery date is 17th December 2025.

I would like to inform you that the estimated date of delivery depends on the availability of the medicines and the delivery pin code. Also, be informed that PharmEasy will always try to ensure that your order is delivered at the earliest as we completely understand the urgency of the medicine.

Once the order is confirmed it will be processed further. Your order will be delivered within the estimated delivery date committed at the time of order placement. Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha
